DOC.brief_summary: To assess the difference in clinical outcome between lacerations in the hand treated by sutures versus treated by tissue adhesive.
DOC.brief_title: Suturing vs Biological Adhesive in Simple Lacerations of Hand
DOC.criteria: Any age Hand laceration distal to the volar wrist crease. Fracture , tendon, artery involvement, more than 8 hours from laceration to trx, Immunosuppression Anticoagulation therapy Diabetes Unable to achieve homeostasis in more than 15 minutes Unwilling to participate in the study Unable to participate in the follow up or bite of any kind.
DOC.keyword: Hand laceration distal to the volar wrist crease
